title: How to Use a Daruma Good Luck Doll

steps.headline: Buy your Daruma doll in the beginning of a new year.
steps.description: At this stage the doll has eyes without pupils.

steps.headline: Fill in the left eye of the Daruma, while concentrating on your wish.
Place your Daruma in your house altar.
steps.description: If unavailable, give it another prominent place.

steps.headline: Add the right eye when and if the wish comes true.

tyn: Paint to fill in the eyes
